meanings.definition: A person who places a bet or wager.
meanings.sent1: The stakers at the horse race were excited to see who would win.
meanings.sent2: The casino was full of stakers hoping to strike it lucky.
meanings.sent3: The stakers at the poker table were all in good spirits, enjoying the game.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a staker in the game of life, taking risks and hoping for the best.
meanings.sent5: The stakers in the stock market were always watching the numbers closely.

meanings.definition: A tool used for securing plants to a support.
meanings.sent1: Gardening enthusiasts use stakers to help their plants grow upright.
meanings.sent2: The tomato plants in the garden were supported by sturdy stakers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to climb the staker, thinking it was a tree.
meanings.sent4: The vines twisted around the staker like a snake coiling around its prey.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flowers bloomed beautifully with the help of the stakers.
